Name: Gallagher
Desc: The current head of the Bloodhound Family at Penacony. He is always courteous toward guests but keeps his vigilance about him. He seems to be a character with a complicated past, yet never actively mentions any details.

1.Name: Salty Dog
1.Desc: Regenerates <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Energy when Gallagher enters the battle and increases his Effect RES by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>.

2.Name: Lion's Tail
2.Desc: The Skill removes <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> debuff(s) from a target ally. At the same time, it increases Effect RES by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

3.Name: Corpse Reviver
3.Desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

4.Name: Last Word
4.Desc: Increases the turn duration for the Besotted state inflicted by Gallagher's Ultimate for <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

5.Name: Death in the Afternoon
5.Desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

6.Name: Blood and Sand
6.Desc: Increases Gallagher's Break Effect by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> and Weakness Break Efficiency by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>.

130101.Name: Corkage Fee
130101.Desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Gallagher's ATK to a single enemy.

130102.Name: Special Brew
130102.Desc: Immediately heals one ally for <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak></color> HP.

130103.Name: Champagne Etiquette
130103.Desc: Inflicts Besotted on all enemies, lasting for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s). At the same time, deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Gallagher's ATK to all enemies, and enhances the next Basic ATK to Nectar Blitz.

130104.Name: Tipsy Tussle
130104.Desc: The Besotted state increases the Break DMG that targets receive by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[f1]%</unbreak></color>. Every time a Besotted target is attacked by an ally, the attacker heals <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak></color> HP.

130106.Name: Attack
130106.Desc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

130107.Name: Artisan Elixir
130107.Desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. Deals Fire DMG equal to <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of Gallagher's ATK and inflicts Besotted on all enemies upon entering battle, lasting for <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

130108.Name: Nectar Blitz
130108.Desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Gallagher's ATK to a single enemy and reduces the target's ATK by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[f1]%</unbreak></color>, lasting for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

1.PointDesc: Increases Outgoing Healing of this unit by an amount equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of Break Effect, up to a maximum Outgoing Healing increase of <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>.
Immediately advance this unit's Action Forward by <unbreak>100%</unbreak> after they use their Ultimate.
When Gallagher uses Nectar Blitz to attack enemies that are in the Besotted state, the HP Restore effect of his Talent for this attack will apply to other allies as well.
